dark-400.description: Different from grey text for some reason

alert-yellow.description: Warning: an action or situation means user may not able to complete a task.

success-green.description: An action has been completed successfully.

error-red.description: System error, or or status which will prevent a user from completing their task.

nt-gov-focus-state-border.description: Focus state outline for buttons or other non-text components.

ntgc-focus-state-border.description: Focus state outline for buttons or other non-text components.

text-inverted.description: Headings, icons, elements in components if on a dark background.

text-action.description: Brand blue text for links, action items, component headings.

text-moderate.description: Slightly softer for UI components like labels and menu items.

text-accent-subtle.description: Lighter/subtle option for placeholder text, help text, microcopy, UI elements like exit buttons.

text-disabled.description: For text that is disabled on action/interactive elements.

page-secondary.description: When components/sections of a page have a grey background.

background-dark.description: Top nav bar, sticky nav, footer.

background-beige-light.description: Beige footer, some components have a beige element.

background-tertiary.description: Beige footer, some components have a beige element.

border-primary.description: Primary border and/or accent colours of components.

border-secondary.description: Component accent colour - NOT a hover state.

border-subtle.description: Component element colour e.g. borders, lines that contain or space our other elements etc.

focus-tbd.description: Component element colour e.g. borders, lines that contain or space our other elements etc.

border-info.description: Component element colour e.g. borders, lines that contain or space our other elements etc.

border-success.description: Component element colour e.g. borders, lines that contain or space our other elements etc.

border-warning.description: Component element colour e.g. borders, lines that contain or space our other elements etc.

border-error.description: Component element colour e.g. borders, lines that contain or space our other elements etc.
